vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for a tower/antenna for cellular communication use on property zoned an R-7.5(A) Single Family District, on the east side of Pleasant Drive, north of Lake June Road
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a revised site plan and conditions
Z201-216(LG)
